rupiyal koti 5500ka wiyadamin idi kerena uma oya jala yojana kramaya kriyathmaka kerena pradeshayen iwath karana pawul 205kata idam ha niwasa pakejayak handunwadimata rajaya thiranaya kara atha.janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahathage upades matha mema thiranayata elambaa thibe.akkara 40ka bhumi pramanayak yatathe idikerena uma oya jala yojana kramaya yatathe niwasa ahimi wena pawul 68, sandaha badulla walimada ‘dayabo’ the waththen ha moragolla the waththen ek pawulakata akkarayaka idamak ha angasampurna niwesak bagin idikara dimata rajaya piyawara ganu atha.esema jalashayata yatawena kumbauru ha wenath gowibim wenuwen mahawaliye hadapanagala pradeshayen akkara dekaka bhumi pramanayak labadimatada rajaya thiranaya kara atha.walimada – uuwaparanagama arambai uma oya jala yojana kramaya wallawaya dakwa kilomitar 21k wyaptha wena bawath, ehi umanga adi 720ka bawumakinda yuktha bawath, warimarga ha jala sampath kalamanakarana amathi nimal siripalada silwa mahatha prakasha keleya.meya monaragala, hambanthota disthrikka dakwa wyaptha kerena bawada ki hethema emangin gowi bim akkara 20,000kata jalaya labagatha haki bawath kiweya.nawa jalashaya idikirimen wallawaya widulibalagara megawot 240ka jala widuliyak uthpadanaya kerena bawada amathiwaraya kiya.jalashaye jala mattam ihala yana kalasimawaladi uthura yana jalaya ek ras kirimata dayabo pradeshaye upa jalashayakda sakasana bawa ee mahatha anawaranaya keleya.
